name: Another World - Thought Taboo
description:
In this mysterious world, you will set foot on dangerous areas, go through many difficulties, fight dangerous monsters, defeat extremely powerful enemies, and become the strongest in the world. I believe you will do it.

Game Features：
  • Up to six optional occupations, different occupations have different skills and characteristics.
  • With seven well-designed scenes, let's explore as much as we want.
  • Fight fierce battles with more than twenty kinds of monster enemies.
  • The rich town life satisfies your fantasies about the strange world.
  • And much more waiting for you to explore...

Obtain the gift of mysterious power through adventure, and grow into a powerful brave step by step. Only in this way, you are qualified to face the devil who will end everything.
But there is a terrifying truth hidden in this world, can you discover it?

Good luck with your adventure!
